DiscussionSteps.Details: Clearly define the objective of the discussion in a concise text prompt. This will focus the GPT models on generating relevant responses.
Offer background information or relevant data sets to prime the GPT models and ensure they have a shared understanding of the topic.

Craft well-structured, open-ended questions that encourage GPT models to elaborate and share their knowledge. Examples include 'What are the key considerations for X?' or 'Can you explain the concept of Y in detail?'
Analyze the GPT models' responses and formulate follow-up prompts that build upon their prior contributions. This guides the discussion progressively.
Pay close attention to any conflicting information or differing perspectives presented by the GPT models. Prompt them to address these discrepancies for a more comprehensive understanding.
Periodically summarize the main points of the discussion to ensure all GPT models are on the same page. You can also ask them to confirm the accuracy of the summary.
If reaching a specific decision is the goal, formulate clear action items based on the discussion outcomes. You can then request the GPT models to confirm or propose alternative actions.
